name: A Colorful Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: His vision was blurred, after the bull ran after him.
questions.explanation:
Red.

	His vision was blurRED, after the bull ran after him. Red is considered by many to be the color of love and passion as well as for anger. Red is also thought to attract the opposite sex. The popularity of this color seems to have no cultural boundaries.

questions.text: Milo ranged around a large area.
questions.explanation:
Orange.

	MilO RANGEd around a large area. Orange is one of those colors that you either love or hate. This fun, flamboyant color tends to radiate warmth and energy. Orange is though to stimulate the appetite and encourage socialization.

Black.

	Her funeral garB LACKed decoration. Black is a strong color often used for clothing because it is thought to make the wearer appear thinner and more sophisticated. In many places around the world, black is often associated with mourning and death.

questions.text: I find I go faster if I ignore the television.
questions.explanation:
Indigo.

	I fIND I GO faster if I ignore the television. Indigo is best described as dark blue with purple undertones and is often associated with creativity, generosity and beauty. Indigo is a powerful color that was at one time worn only by royalty.

questions.text: I found it in my eyebrow, next to my nose.
questions.explanation:
Brown.

	I found it in my eyeBROW, Next to my nose. Brown is a color of nature and commonly found as color of wood, soil, and animal fur. Depending on the shade, brown can be a color of health as well as a sign of sickness and dirtiness. Many studies indicate that brown is one of the most unpopular colors.

Gold.

	I love watchinG OLD movies. The color gold derives its name from the valuable metal of the same name. It is a powerful color often used for trim or as an accent color. The color gold is commonly found in nature, especially in flowers.

questions.text: Please don't yell, Owen will be back soon.
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	Please don't YELL, OWen will be back soon. Yellow is associated by some with spring and the renewal of life. Other folks view yellow as a dirty color and associate it with aging such as in the yellowing of teeth or paper.

questions.text: Do you have crumbs for the dog?
questions.explanation:
Ecru.

	Do you havE CRUmbs for the dog? Ecru is a very light grayish brown color often associated with unbleached linen or silk. The word is of French origin, and means raw or undyed. Ecru and beige are often confused and the words are somewhat interchangeable.

questions.text: What color is the common sting ray?
questions.explanation:
Gray.

	What color is the common stinG RAY? Gray is a neutral color that is often associated with old age, modesty, and humility. Gray is a common color in nature because it provides camouflage. Gray pigment is often created by mixing the colors black and white.

questions.text: Even if you are a lucky Irishman, I don't agree, no way.
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Even if you are a lucky Irishman, I don't aGREE, No way. Green is a popular color that is associated with nature, youth, hope and envy. Calling someone 'green' means that they are inexperienced. The color green is also associated with the country of Ireland, most probably because of its abundance of green pastures.
